page.title: 13Advertising+New Enterprises
page.content: The{New Forest Post}is a free newspaper which is distributed throughout our survey area-circulation of 38,475/week. It is produced in Lymington. It highlights matters of national and particularly local concern. It also advertises local shops, businesses, products,events and endeavors. It recently put the spotlight on the {Gordleton Industrial Park}in Sway Rd. (10 new factory units) which in June 1985 were not all taken. The large surrounding area (old gravel pits) will also be developed. We visited one unit which produces a new local product{New Forest Icecream. Milk and cream from local farms is used and 7 flavours are produced for sale in 30 local shops. With 2 full- time & 3 part-time staff 1000 to 2000 litre tubs are made per hour.
